name: Goblin
description: Clever enough to make traps, foolish enough to step in them.

name: Tiger
description: Its roar shakes the forest, its claws carve legends into the earth.

name: Shinigami
description: With every swing of the scythe, another name is crossed from its list.

name: Wanderer
description: With no home to return to, the road itself becomes a companion.

name: Demon
description: Whispers of ruin follow in its wake, promising power at a terrible cost.

name: Treant
description: Ancient guardians of the wood, their roots run as deep as their wisdom.

name: Fish
description: Silent, unblinking, and always watching from the depths.

name: Paladin
description: A beacon of light amidst the darkness, unyielding in faith.

name: Warlock
description: The price of forbidden knowledge is paid in whispers and shadows.

name: Wizard
description: The arcane bends to their will, though it is never without a cost.

name: Bird
description: A fleeting shadow against the sun, untouchable and free.

name: Rat
description: Where one scurries, a hundred more lie in wait.
